Articles.Content:
So, I'm currently performing my first mission to Duna for this save and I want to bring all of my science back so I haven't transmitted any of it. At last count I had over 108 experiments stored in my Command pod (It's the one from the Deep Space Mission Pack) when I send my lander to land on Ike. I do 33 experiments there and when I get back to the mother ship All of my hard earned experimentation is gone!

Is there anyway to fix this? (I'm not above save file editing, I just don't know what to change)
Backup your persistent file. after that F9...quick load.

F9...quick load.

Too late for that, And my lander (With all my science equipment) is gone. I smashed it into the surface of Ike so I wouldn't have all the extra weight to carry back. Not to mention, thanks to a botched landing, I couldn't have carried my Lander back to Duna anyway seeing as how I knocked the docking port off...

Edited January 23, 2014 by Taki117
